mapper.update: update PAYMENT set MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType}, CARD_NUMBER = #{cardNumber}, CARD_EXPIRATION = #{cardExpiration}, CARD_NAME = #{cardName}, CARD_CVC = #{cardCvc} where CARD_SERIAL = #{cardSerial}
mapper.select: select CARD_SERIAL cardSerial, MEMBER_EMAIL memberEmail, PAYMENT_TYPE paymentType, CARD_NUMBER cardNumber, CARD_EXPIRATION cardExpiration, CARD_NAME cardName, CARD_CVC cardCvc from PAYMENT where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} order by CARD_SERIAL DESC
